com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone
Class ShuffleMain

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone.ShuffleMain

public class ShuffleMain
extends Activity

This is the main activity of the app. Allows for setting the settings of the app and gives access to all the other activities

Author:
Tydiz
